tool.name: ISA to nmrML
tool.description: Extract nmrML files from an ISA dataset and output a collection of nmrML dataset.
tool.help:
==================== ISA to nmrML ====================
Extract nmrML files contained inside an ISA archive.
----- Input -----
ISA dataset ===========
The ISA-Tab dataset from which to extract the files.
------ Output ------
The output is a collection of nmrML files.
